title: Research
text: Here I will share what I did in my Masters and PhD and link to publications

title: Fonti
text:
I’m Fonti and I am an evolutionary biologist wearing R developer shoes. I work with researchers and turn their ideas into accessible tools. I like to learn new things in R and sharing it with others. I am an organiser for UNSWcodeRs - a student and staff run R user community at the University of New South Wales.




Research Software Developer | Jul 2023 - Present
Falster Lab / UNSW
Analytics Manager | Jun 2022 - Present
Invertebrates Australia
Data Analyst | Jun 2022 - Jun 2023
Atlas of Living Australia / CSIRO
Research Software Developer | Jan 2021 - Jan 2023
Falster Lab / UNSW
Research Assistant | 2019
Bioanalytical Mass Spectrometry Facility / UNSW




Ph. D. | Jul 2016 – Apr 2021
School of Biological, Earth & Environmental Sciences, University of New South Wales
* Thesis: The Role of Developmental Temperature on Phenotypic Development and Evolution
M. Res | Jan 2014 - Feb 2016
School of Biological Sciences, Macquarie University
* Thesis: Predictors of Social Dominance and its Role in Social Information Use
B. Sc | Jul 2009 - May 2013
Major in Biological Sciences and Statistics, University of Auckland
